body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Express. My name is Bruce Washington.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, eight nine zero, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice. And could you also share your email address with me, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is jturner@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Janice.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We will look into the shipping concern you have with your recent car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Janice. Have a wonderful day!
